alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 15 at 4:33PM MST until October 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM MST FOR CENTRAL PINAL COUNTY... At 432 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 14 miles southwest of Kearny to 7 miles southeast of La Palma to 7 miles south of Arizona City, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Eloy, Picacho, Cactus Forest and East Chui-Chu. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
